Professional Experience
My Portfolio
Student at Thomas More geel
PeepeePoopoo
IT HELPDESK • ECOVER MALLE • JANUARY 2018 \– FEBRUARY 2018

As a student, I helped out with designing a new user interface for the company\'s SAP system, as well as help with different aspects of the IT helpdesk, such as solving software issues, correctly installing hardware and maintaining servers. Besides this, I also helped with transferring Ecover\'s online working environment from on\-premise to the cloud.
CASHIER AND STOCK • CARREFOUR VORSELAAR • JULY 2016 \– AUGUST 2016
My tasks were mostly serving customers at the cash register, refilling the racks, retrieving products from the stock and arrange them.
IT SPECIALIST • HOUT LUYTEN MORKHOVEN • AUGUST 2020 \- NOW
I helped with the company\'s transfer from SDP to SAP. Currently I am still employed at Hout Luyten as a temporary replacement for their IT specialist.
HIGH SCHOOL DIPLOMA IT & Networking • 2018 • KOSH COLLEGE HERENTALS
In the year 2017\-2018 I graduated wit a high school diploma in IT & Networking at kOsh College Herentals.
2 YEARS OF APPLIED COMPUTER SCIENCE KDG ANTWERPEN
During 2018\-2019 and 2019\-2020 I studied applied computer science at Karel de Grote college in Antwerp.
My motivation

The biggest motivation for my dreamjob is finding a job where I can feel good. I have been studying IT for the past 5 years and it is truly something I love doing. During my time at Hout Luyten and Ecover I have learned that I would like to continue in this direction, but preferrably somewhere I can be myself. I believe Thomas More can give me this chance. Ever since I switched from Karel de Grote to Thomas More, I\'ve felt better and I\'ve regained my joy for IT.

My student life begun at Karel de Grote college in Antwerp. Here I spent 2 years of my life studying applied computer science. Afterwards, I transferred to Thomas More in Geel, where I started over with a clean slate in the IT Factory.
My Personal Development Plan
